articles.title: Billie Eilish Reveals ‘Hit Me Hard and Soft’ World Tour, Starting in September - Variety
articles.description: Billie Eilish has revealed the dates for her 'Hit Me Hard and Soft' world tour.
articles.content:
Billie Eilish is embarking on a world tour in support of her forthcoming third album, “Hit Me Hard and Soft,” set for release on May 17. 
The Live Nation-produced tour will kick off in September in … [+4659 chars]

articles.title: Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein in hospital after conviction overturned - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Weinstein’s 2020 rape conviction was recently overturned, but the one-time movie mogul’s troubles are far from over.
articles.content:
Disgraced Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein has been hospitalised days after his 2020 rape conviction in New York was overturned, his lawyer says.
